data.name: L.A.P.D. 2195
data.detailed_description:
A modern re-imagining of the classic game "Future Cop L.A.P.D.”, you are a rookie cop in the Advanced Weapons and Tactics Unit of the Los Angeles Police Department in the year 2195. Your journey begins in a combat simulator where you learn to pilot a police mech, utilizing a vast array of advanced weaponry and gear. Eventually, you will take the fight to the streets, reclaiming your city from the vicious gangs controlling the various districts and saving its citizenry from an urban dystopia.



The game will release as what I like to call "Free For Now", meaning it will be 100% free forever, for those who download the game during this free period. All future updates to this game will be yours for free. Eventually, when I feel the time is right, I will add a price tag to the game that I feel is fair. So don't wait, grab the game now, and if you want, please consider leaving a review; good or bad, they truly help.

-Peter Ryan
Lead Developer, Apeirogon Games

data.short_description: A modern re-imagining of the classic game "Future Cop L.A.P.D.”, you are a rookie cop in the Advanced Weapons and Tactics Unit of the Los Angeles Police Department in the year 2195.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,10,11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card (GTX 1060 or AMD RX580)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board
  • Additional Notes: System Requirements may change by release
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,10,11
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or AMD RX 5700 XT or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Discreet Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Recommended System Requirements may change by release
